TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: Building a Eurofighter Typhoon with EJ_SA!

Articles.Content:
Do you wanna see EJ_SA build and fly a Eurofighter Typhoon?

https://www.twitch.tv/ej_sa/v/85847663

Defniitely not. In my mind I have a little rule that if someone is ever streaming/recording how they build the craft, it's almost definitely a replica done WRONG. That is, a replica which is effectively totally different from the real one, looks like an accident waiting to happen in the eyes of anyone experienced with KSP and/or reality, and which flies like Krap in the game. This video is a very clear definition of this kind of video.

BTW "do you wanna"? That sounds like some new trend in english grammar 

Edited September 1, 2016 by TheDestroyer111

Sure wish I could watch but can't get twitch anymore. It goes to the site, but then it just sits there and buffers. Think it started with the advent of Windows 10. Yes, I'm a computer moron.

Help,,, anyone ? Sorry, I know this is off topic. 

Or someone PM me. Just looking for help.
